attributes.action: explore the lack of investigation in smaller war torn countries
attributes.additional_details: i also want the government to do this as it could lead to positive consequences with the uk able to send supply packages and NGO's will be able to see the awareness raised by government and help out with the situation
attributes.background: i would like the government to increase their investigations into smaller war torn countries and not turn a blind eye to other countries due to the ongoing events in ukraine.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
